TextView.android:text:
1.When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
2.Although the world is full of suffering, it is full also of the overcoming of it.
3.People don't like to think, if one thinks, one must reach conclusions.
4.Happiness does not come from without, it comes from within.
5.Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
6.Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
7.It is a terrible thing to see and have no vision.
